resources.string: Sign in to customize your schedule

string.name: dialog_sign_in_content
string.translation_description: The content of the dialog. When the user needs to sign in.

resources.string: Sign in to save sessions and build your custom schedule. Saved sessions will be synced from your account across devices.

string.name: not_now
string.translation_description: The description of a button that the user doesn't want to sign in.

string.name: sign_in
string.translation_description: The description of a button to sign in.

string.name: firebase_auth_no_network_connection
string.translation_description: Snackbar message when there is no network connectivity.

string.name: firebase_auth_unknown_error
string.translation_description: Snackbar message when Firebase Auth has an unknown error.

string.name: dialog_sign_out_title
string.translation_description: The title of the dialog. Used to confirm that the user wants to sign out.

string.name: dialog_sign_out_content
string.translation_description: The content of the dialog. Used to confirm that the user wants to sign out.

resources.string: All saved events remain synced to your account.

string.name: sign_out
string.translation_description: The description of a button to sign out.

string.name: remove_reservation_title
string.translation_description: The title of the dialog when the user is about to remove their reservation.

string.name: remove_reservation_content
string.translation_description: The content of the dialog when the user is about to cancel their reservation.

resources.string: You\'re about to give up your seat for \"%1$s\". If you decide not to reserve a seat but still want to attend, all sessions will have a portion of seats available first come, first serve onsite.

string.name: cancel
string.translation_description: The label of the button to keep the seat.

string.name: remove
string.translation_description: The label of the button to release the seat.

string.name: swap_reservation_title
string.translation_description: The title of the dialog when the user is about to change their reservation from one session to another.

string.name: swap_reservation_content
string.translation_description: The content of the dialog when the user is about to change their reservation from one session to another.

resources.string: You already have a reservation/waitlist for \"%1$s\". Only one reservation per time block is allowed. Would you like to swap for \"%2$s\"?

string.name: swap
string.translation_description: The label of the button to swap the reservation with another.

string.name: notifications_preference_dialog_title
string.translation_description: The title of the dialog for the notifications preference

string.name: notifications_preference_dialog_content
string.translation_description: The content of the dialog for the notifications preference

resources.string: Would you like to be notified when your starred events are about to start? You can change this setting under \"Info > Settings\" at any time.

string.name: notifications_preference_dialog_content_instant
string.translation_description: The content of the dialog for the notifications preference to show if the user is using the Instant App

resources.string: If you would like to be notified when your starred events are about to start, you will need to install the app.

string.name: no
string.translation_description: Negative answer to the question \'Would you like to receive notification?\'

string.name: yes
string.translation_description: Positive answer to the question \'Would you like to receive notification?\'

item.translation_description: Unit for duration of time by hours. Singular.
Unit for duration of time by hours. Plural.
Unit for duration of time by minutes. Singular.
Unit for duration of time by minutes. Plural.

resources.string: Join us online. We\'ll be streaming the keynotes and most sessions live.

string.translation_description: The label for the display of the number of hours until the conference starts

string.name: no_dowry_title
string.translation_description: Header label for no dowry details.

string.name: no_gift_title
string.translation_description: Header label for no gift details.

string.name: gift_for_social_cause_title
string.translation_description: Header label for gift for social cause details.

string.name: no_dowry_description
string.translation_description: Details explaining why dowry should not be taken.

resources.string:
Being a part of this weird society, it is difficult to make the earlier generation understand that dowry is not a good practice. But unfortunately it is being practiced heavily in India in the name of tradition. Even we have tried to break this tradition and failed miserably.

Well we are not from those who accept the defeat easily. So the solution we conclude is:
I (Chandra Sekhar) will return the dowry after the marriage or donate it for some good cause. I hope, it will come to true soon.

string.name: no_gift_description
string.translation_description: Details explaining why gifts should not be taken.

resources.string: Gifts are something that never excites me. Now a days we have changed the definition of Shagun completely. So please avoid giving gifts.

string.name: gift_for_social_cause_description
string.translation_description: Details explaining why we will invest your gifts for some social cause.

resources.string:
If you still want to give us some gift, then please do us a favor by sending some money instead of buying a gift (physical good, gift cards, etc.).

The amount we collect from you all will be invested for some or the other social cause of your choice.

Don\'t worry!!!
This will be 100% transparent. Moreover, we will communicate with you before utilizing it for any social cause.

Account Details
Account Holder Name - Chandra Sekhar Nayak
Account Number - 11357558854
IFSC Code - SBIN0001320


Account Holder Name - Rilikta Nayak
Account Number - 30585713284
IFSC Code - SBIN0002112

Pay Using UPI
Pay to Chandra Sekhar Nayak
